name: centrifugo-server
description: Серверная часть Centrifugo с gRPC API и TypeScript скриптом отправки сообщений

scripts.test-proto: ts-node -e "const grpc = require('@grpc/grpc-js'); const protoLoader = require('@grpc/proto-loader'); const path = require('path'); const packageDefinition = protoLoader.loadSync(path.join(__dirname, 'proto', 'api.proto'), { keepCase: true, longs: String, enums: String, defaults: true, oneofs: true }); const centrifugoProto = grpc.loadPackageDefinition(packageDefinition); console.log('Proto структура:', JSON.stringify(centrifugoProto, null, 2));"

author: Tauri Centrifugo Plugin
